Tests that CSSOM-modified shorthands are reporting their "important" bits.

Text

element.style { ()

#inspected { (<style>â€¦</style>)
    margin-top: 10px;
    padding: 10px 50px !important;
        padding-top: 10px;
        padding-right: 50px;
        padding-bottom: 10px;
        padding-left: 50px;
